name: [GGJ19] Kizuna 絆
description:
In Kizuna, you build bonds with similar organisms(zunas). You foster a relationship and share your energy resources like a family. These bonds tie you together so pay close attention to them and take care not to break them in haste!

Feeding on delicious Tiny Jellies will help strengthen your bonds with your nearest Zunas.

Controls
Click and Drag on woke zuna to guide the entire family.
Drag and drop Tiny Jellies onto zuna and bonds will be strengthened.
Zunas each have the potential to Rise, and rising with your family allows you to float higher above.

But, not all Zunas have the best interests for the family...
